website_summaries.verdict: This large kit includes alphabet and number tiles, cars, light-up tiles, geometric shape tiles, and just about anything else you could imagine.
pros: 180 piece educational kit with 26 alphabet tiles,10 numbers tiles, 11 Roman numeral tiles, 2 cars, 2 LED glow-in-the-dark tiles and 2 large 3-by-1 columns
Also includes 8 symbols, 38 small triangles, 34 right triangles, 18 isosceles triangles, 2 large squares and 27 windows and other pieces
cons: CR 2032 batteries for LED tiles not included

customer_reviews.title: Beware, pieces come apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this product was affordable. However, the quality is poor. My four year old daughter was able to take one of the pieces apart and take out the tiny magnets. We have a Magnatile brand set also that has never come apart. For these types of toys, you get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: do not match with other picasso tiles
customer_reviews.text: i bought Picasso Tiles set because i have one, but they are different, and don't match each other. i like these toy but it disappointed me. my son want to do the train but one of the wheels base from my old set is smaller than the bases from this set. if i know that they don't match may be i try other brand, which is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Upscaling
customer_reviews.text: Bought a smaller Picasso Tiles set last year and it was a tremendous hit, with both grandson and son-in-law. So this year I'm following up with this big set and Picasso Tiles STEAM Engineering kit. We plan to keep the older set at our house so we only have 60 pieces to find, not 180. We'll let the parents deal with the larger set; in true Grandparent form.
customer_reviews.author: ACAR

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young and old for hours and hours
customer_reviews.text: My niece told me about this toy with me when she discovered it for her grandsons. I gave a set to my four year old grandson for Christmas. He played with it all day and in to the night. His 14 year old cousin joined him and so did her Dad. So many options and possibilities to use your imagination. I got my every penny's worth. And lots of "Grandma Points".
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Senior

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: You can never have enough of these!! My son and I were building with our set one day and ran out so I purchased this one since it was the largest set I could find. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Fun and engaging!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 2.5 year old really love playing with these. At their young age, I recommend supervision while play to avoid any situations involving accidental magnet ingestion. Recently saw on news a child broke one open and ingested the magnets. So age appropriateness is important or supervision is recommended. The toy itself is great and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I operate an in-home daycare. These magnetic tiles hold up well to 10-12 kids building all day. These tiles are a favorite of all the children and I love the way they can try new things with them. I have found these tiles to be excellent quality and will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: evmom2

customer_reviews.title: all of my kids love these - I have twin 2-year-olds and a 4-year old
customer_reviews.text: These magnet tiles in rainbow colors are the best toy we ever bought our kids. They all play with them every day - our daughter makes towering castles, and our younger kids stack them and stick them to our dishwasher. They have been a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Yosem Companys

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I have purchased. My 4 year grandson likes his first set so much we got him a second one so he could build more and bigger things. We also bought a set for our 2 year old great niece for her 2nd birthday.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy but Be Careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: These magnet tiles are awesome and so fun to play with but PLEASE supervise smaller kids when using them. My 3 year old son was playing in his room with these tiles and I walked in to discover that one of the magnet tiles had split apart and broken and he was playing with 3 of the very small magnets in his mouth. The consequences if he had swallowed them would have been devastating. The tiles appear very durable, but it is not as hard to get those little magnets out as I would have liked. Again, its a great toy, but not safe for use without supervision for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Never heard my 3 yr old niece ask me if I wanted to play blocks so many times. These are amazing, a huge upgrade from leggo square tiles. I even noticed she understands more sophisticated shapes now. A must have for kids
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: These are the very best building toys imaginable for the toy space I've made ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best building toys imaginable for the toy space I've made for my grandchildren's frequent visits. We're aged from a bit over 1, 3, 4, 16, with late 30s parents, thru 70s, and we all play happily with them for hours on end, and they all tidy up into an approx 12x15x4 lidded plastic storage box from BB&B.
customer_reviews.author: alsoanonyma

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren because they play with a similar set whenever they go to the library. They love the tiles and spend alot of time designing buildings . Their favorite designs are the mazes they make for their pet guinea pig. Humphrey likes it because there is always a carrot at the end of the maze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply THE BEST fine motor activity!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this set for my kindergarten classroom. We begin each day of school with 15 minutes of fine motor play, and Picasso Tiles are always a favorite! I purchased a second set for my little boy at home, and he loves them just as much! This building set is perfect for incorporating fine motor play into every day! -Casey S.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these. She spends hours with them. They are fantastic. I've never had magnatiles brand, so I can't directly compare, but they seem great to me.
customer_reviews.author: J.Hester

customer_reviews.title: Fun and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: HOURS of fun everyday! My 3yo adores these and it’s fun for mom and dad to play as well. They are really pretty, teach our girl about shapes and different ways to build, and so much more. If she had to pick only one gift to keep from her Christmas loot, she’d keep this one and give the rest back.
customer_reviews.author: Darcimi

customer_reviews.title: Tiles can come apart
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are fun to play with, but one of them separated and magnets came out. It is the same piece as another reviewer took a picture of, so I'm guessing that this is a pretty consistent manufacturing problem. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! Already have bout a few others for my son and this time had to go big. Just as good as any other name magnet tiles. My only concern is shipping.. no box? Not to mention it wasn't even taped? Why. Can't complain since it's free prime and nothing missing, but just seems a bit careless 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: tony ozegovich

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I have given multiple sets of these tiles to multiple grandchildren. They all love them and can play with them for hours. They can be so creative! Great toys. A favorite!
customer_reviews.author: CBB

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Great present for the little ones and big ones. The birthday boy who turned 2, loves tearing down his 3yr old brother's designs.
customer_reviews.author: missmar2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, hours of play
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. This is our 3rd set of Picasso tiles. The cars are great to build off of! Love the different tiles in this set. Great quality and hours of play for kids and adults! Fits nice in the box for travel, we take these to Grandma and Grandpas often!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina / Jared Schwiner

customer_reviews.title: Kids of all ages can have fun with these
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Read another review here on amazon and a gentleman did a comparison between these and magnatiles. These won. More bang for ur buck. Highly recommend. Bought these for my 3 year old and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rose Neurock

customer_reviews.title: The creativity increases the different tiles especially the car bases.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandsons. I wanted something different to add or to regular Picosso tiles. This is good for the 3year old as it has numbers and letters. They both love the car based. Please note that the specialized tiles are not as sturdy as regular shapes but the child has to use their skills when building. This just requires an adjustment in building which both boys did quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy target lover

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my grandchildren last year. They are still pulling them out every time they come for a visit. From the youngest at age 2 to the oldest at age 7, they keep the children entertainment. The combinations of block building is endless, and encourages their creativity and imagination. I will be adding to the set this year. The perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and a safety hazard!
customer_reviews.text: We have a set of Picasso Tiles and they are very durable and fantastic. We purchased this set to add to our 3-year-old’s fun. The tiles felt lighter and we noticed the magnets seemed thinner and weaker than the set we already have. Within one week of opening them and after only a few days of actual play, one tile lost three magnets. We immediately returned the set. Considering the wonderful variety this set offers, we were extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Magna Tiles!
customer_reviews.text: We love Picasso Tiles in our household. We have bought 2 of the big sets of these. My kids play with these every day! (Ages 8, 6 and 3) They are very durable and well made. I think personally they are just as good as the Magna Tile brand but more affordable. We will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Dosa

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids adore these
customer_reviews.text: These tiles are amazing for kids! My 3-year old grandson can build towers taller than himself, and the magnetic edges hold it together. Of course an unwary touch will knock it over, but really these are just such a fun toy and learning aid.
customer_reviews.author: Author

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best gift we've ever bought. Children (and adults!) can be entertained for hours on end. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: beejay

customer_reviews.title: Better and cheaper than other magnet tiles!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 2 1/2 year old busy for hours! He loves them. They are durable with a strong magnetic hold. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCormick

customer_reviews.title: The entire family has had fun with the tiles
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must have for 3-99 years old. The entire family has had fun with the tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price on Picasso tiles!
customer_reviews.text: Consistently my son’s favorite toy. He’s 5 and has played with these for about a year. We bought more because he loves to build with them and create new scenes. Of all the toys he owns, this is his go-to that he picks up almost on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it, but could be more durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Picasso Tiles for my niece, and she loves playing with them! They could be a little bit more durable since she is smashing them around a lot, and I already know that the first tiles will break soon. I do like the letters on them though, and the tiles help her grasp concepts like physics and architecture!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Different quality than the 60 piece set!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a 60 piece set and wanted to compliment it with more tiles (mi kid loves it!) but they are definitely not the same quality, I first noticed the edges, they are sharp on this set, and magnets don't hold as well as in the other. I even thought that maybe this isn't an "original" Picasso version, I should had bought a smaller set since I now read reviews that I'm not the first one to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gomez

customer_reviews.title: My boys love them!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 4 year old boys love these! They have held up to my boys' rough play and they enjoy the variety of shapes! My 2nd grade students also love using these! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: JustJess

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but I still love them. I have a childcare in my home ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but I still love them. I have a childcare in my home and ALL of the kids love them and play with them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue
customer_reviews.text: Within the first play session this happened. Quite the safety hazard. I am trying to contact the company directly. This has thus far only occurred with this one tile. Play was happening on carpet, and pieces were not thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R

customer_reviews.title: The best and strongest
customer_reviews.text: I have bought four different brands and oh my, these are the strongest ones. They are compatible with the other 3 brands but to be honest, you won't want to mix them after trying these.
customer_reviews.author: ROSA MARIA LOPEZ SEGARRA

customer_reviews.title: donation
customer_reviews.text: I got these to donate to my grandsons class at school they love them. I give them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! My kids (and I) love these. My girls still play with them consistently. It takes some patience and some Tetris skills to put them back in the same box when they aren't in use but it can me done. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kloud_9

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, kids love it, works well with MagnaTile brand but a lot cheaper - just as great quality!
customer_reviews.author: kevans15

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item! Got it for my 2 years old nephew and he loves it! Can keep him busy for hours!
customer_reviews.author: tal boujo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love these tiles. We’ve had them for about 7 months and they are still in great condition and the kids love playing with them. Good quality and great price especially compared to the other name brand magnetic tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong - my son is almost 5 and has loved these for many years with many years to go. We love building castles and houses and rocketships. Plus, easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: kb1989

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My great grandsons LOVE these tiles, play with them for hours. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: SCHNOOZERMOM

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.text: Do not stick together very well which is frustrating to the childbwho is trying to build. Will be looking for another brand to buy that has a better magnetic hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Work great with magna tiles
customer_reviews.text: These work really well with magna tiles. Same size. Same magnetic strength.
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to our grandsons for their birthday and they just loved them
customer_reviews.author: Dana Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old son has 3 sets of these tiles now. He has been playing with them for 3 years and still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A McDavitt

customer_reviews.title: It’s not like other “magnetic tile” kits and for good reason!
customer_reviews.text: Our Children will play with theses literally from the moment they wake up until they pass out. It’s fun for the whole family. Do not sleep on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as nice as the name brand ones but definitely a nice product at a much nicer price. I'll definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Picasso Tiles
customer_reviews.text: This item was a Christmas gift to 5 and 3 year old brothers. I presume they are having fun with them. I have not heard.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bourdon

customer_reviews.title: A great price for a creative toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these tiles! They are perfect for open-ended play and they are quite lovely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Murad

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: By far the best magnet tiles on the market. The others just collapse, these are strong and awesome. My kids love them and we love playing with them too
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hours of building fun!
customer_reviews.text: My sister got these for my kids and they were fighting over them so much I had to buy a whole new set! Months later, they still play with them almost daily... shocking if you know kids haha
customer_reviews.author: dzignjulz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The hero game of the road trip! Got the kids creative side boooom! Loved the letters and numbers and all the characters too.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My nephew will play with these for jours
customer_reviews.author: Tampa2

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES tiles
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old grandson loves the tiles that were added to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome magnetile alternatives. Great for the price. I've had them for a month and my 3 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fun , safe, creative.
customer_reviews.text: Added to what already bought. Great toy for entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Picasso tiles is always great! My son is spending hours with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Camkurt

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a 3-year old
customer_reviews.text: My niece's son already had a set of these and is very good at building with them. They're a favorite at his daycare, too. He loves them and there are enough in the package to share with other kids in the family. Absolutely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Roy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of mommy time.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids in a range of ages play with these for hours. Which gives me time to read, enjoy wine, or just think. A great gift idea as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: It brings so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 51/2 and 3 year old kids love the magnetic toys very much and they can spend much time working alone and together.
customer_reviews.author: irenebelle

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this toy promotes creativity and imaginative play. Kept my grandsons busy for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: Such awesome yet simple toys that spark so much creativity. 3 year old boy and 6 year old girl both love them, and we enjoy playing them too which is more than you can say for most toys:)
customer_reviews.author: sonnet neisen

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I used these for years in my kindergarten class. Kids played with them everyday and never got tired of them. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It’s much less expensive than the other brand but the quality is as good. My granddaughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Nobue Kawahara

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year for my grandson. He plays with them almost everyday an builds with a great imagination . He seems to always run out of tiles so for Christmas he’s getting another set. Great tiles!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Yunt

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: They play almost every day with this toy! So much creativity goes into this
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: whatever
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful, well made and above all, FUN toy for building creative structures.
customer_reviews.author: Hope S. Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with these. She is 4 years old. She builds all kinds of buildings.
customer_reviews.author: jjtaby2

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool classroom
customer_reviews.text: These tiles have been a huge hit in my preschool class! The children get very creative and it is nice that their creations stay together.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 3 year old. He is so enjoying using this gift according to his Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Sauce L.

customer_reviews.title: Encourages creativity
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old twins love building with Picasso Tiles. They are excellent for encouraging creativity. We have multiple sets which allows them to build some pretty awesome structures.
customer_reviews.author: MATMemphis

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, high quality my 4 and 7 year old play with them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as an add-on to a 80 piece set. Our grandkids just love building with them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Let's you be creative
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this spent 4 hours using them once they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel a. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves to build with them. Second set, needed more tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great building set for any age
customer_reviews.text: Great for any age! Our 1 year old granddaughter builds with them!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are fun fur birth the kids and the adults, they are a great learning toy.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set I have purchased, my grandkids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great experience all round
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to get exactly what you want Well done!

customer_reviews.title: Great creative toy
customer_reviews.text: A very creative toy that will keep kids playing again and again
customer_reviews.author: Vinlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. My kiddos love them. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: BTabs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. Product is durable, which is a must for how much they play with them. Thanks!

product_meta.title: PicassoTiles 180 Piece Set 180pc Building Block Toy Deluxe Construction Kit Magnet Building Tiles Clear Color Magnetic 3D Construction Playboards Educational Blocks Creativity Beyond Imagination
product_meta.description:
Features
- You name it, we got it! Best all in one value pack with all assorted shapes, carts, alphabets, roman numerals, and even got led magnetic tiles! Immerse your kids with the nonstop fun PT180 brings for inspiration.
-Triangles, roman numerals, squares, numbers, the alphabet.180 magnetic tiles to create undefined 3D shapes.
- All PicassoTiles magnetic building sets are compatible as add-on pieces.
- Glow in the dark 3 mode LED light: single breathing light, solid light, group light.
- Infinite entertainment. Develops kids creativity and STEM (science, technology, engineering, and mathematics) skills.
- No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create the master piece 
- Never too early to start developing kids creativity and STEM (science, technology, engineering, and mathematics) skills. 
- Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel the sense of achievement together 
- Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environments 
- Magnet Building Tiles Clear 3D color Magnetic Building Blocks Playboards for preschool, pretend play and more. 

In The Box
-26 alphabet tiles 
-10 numbers 
- 11 roman numerals 
- 2 LED light glow in the dark tiles (CR2032 battery not included) 
- 2 PicassoTiles car truck 
- 2 large three by one column 
- 8 symbols 
- 38 small triangles 
- 34 right triangles 
- 18 isosceles triangles 
- 2 large square 
- 27 various windows & others
feature_bullets: DREAM BIG & BUILD BIG - No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create the master piece. PicassoTiles in colossal styles. 180 piece educational kit features 10 numbers, 11 roman numerals, 2 PicassoTiles car truck, 2 LED light glow in the dark tiles among others. To be used either as a stand along magnet tile set or in conjunction with other PicassoTiles magnetic building blocks as add-on pieces.

LEARNING BY PLAYING - Never too early to start developing kids creativity. Children can acquire strong sense of color, geometrical shapes including 3D forms numbers counts, magnetic polarities & architectural design at early age.

BONDING BY PLAYING - Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel the sense of achievement together. Suitable for all ages (3+ and up) by one party of in groups a great way to spend quality time with the family and love ones.

LEARNING IS FUN - Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environments. Fun and entertaining, perfect educational presents for school age children that will never go out of style.
CREATIVITY BEYOND IMAGINATION - Magnet Building Tiles Clear 3D color Magnetic Building Blocks Playboards for preschool, pretend play and more. Easy to construct and easy to put away for storage.
